Hello! I am Mylan, a young web developer passionate about creating innovative and convincing websites. My specialty lies in front-end development, where I master HTML, CSS, SASS and JavaScript languages, as well as React and Redux Toolkit frameworks. Through an extensive 9-month training at OpenClassRoom, I gained a solid foundation and developed advanced skills in creating dynamic and responsive user interfaces.

My approach is distinguished by my attention to detail and insatiable curiosity. I am constantly on the lookout for the latest trends and technologies to offer both aesthetic and functional web experiences. Technology is changing fast, and I appreciate the challenge of staying at the forefront of my field.
My main goal is to thrive in my career as a front-end developer, creating remarkable websites and remaining open to new exciting opportunities and challenges.
